Airbnb coupon 2013 25$ off

Posted by David on January 21, 2013

Register now and save $25 off your first trip with Airbnb:

How does it work?

1. You can’t be logged in. This is discount for new accounts. click the link in Step 2 and register a new account.

2. Sign up here to get $25 discount

3. Price will drop by $25 for your first booking.

Try to travel with Airbnb.com!

About Airbnb:
Airbnb will help you pay for your first trip. With Airbnb you can book affordable and unique place around the world. Airbnb was founded in August 2008, located in San Francisco (California), is a trusted community marketplace designed for people who want to present their offers space, discover and book unique places around the world – online or on your mobile phone. It does not matter whether it is a suite for one night, a castle for a week, a month or a villa – Airbnb connects people through a unique travel experience for any price, in more than 26 thousand cities and 192 countries. By offering world-class service and facilities with a growing community of users, Airbnb is the easiest way to do it, to reap the financial benefits of extra-curricular space and advertise her audience of millions. With Airbnb coupon code it is possible to rent a room really cheap.
